LanguageData.AnalyzeGommage.label: analyze gommage phenomenon
LanguageData.AnalyzeGommage.description: Study artistic corruption samples to understand the Gommage mechanisms. Accelerates anti-Gommage research.
LanguageData.PlanEmergencyMission.label: plan anti-gommage emergency mission
LanguageData.PlanEmergencyMission.description: Organize an emergency mission to evacuate areas threatened by the Gommage. Improves colonist survival chances.
LanguageData.CalibrateDetector.label: calibrate cursed age detector
LanguageData.CalibrateDetector.description: Improve the cursed age detector's precision for more reliable alerts.
LanguageData.Make_AntiGommageShield.label: craft anti-gommage shield
LanguageData.Make_AntiGommageShield.description: Craft a personal shield against Gommage effects. Limited but effective protection.
LanguageData.MakeExpeditionGear.label: craft expedition uniform
LanguageData.MakeExpeditionGear.description: Create the standard Expedition 33 uniform to identify members and boost morale.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoGuardian.label: forge guardian picto
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoGuardian.descript: Forge a Guardian Picto from Chroma and noble materials. This Picto grants magical protection and can unlock the "Crystal Aegis" Lumina.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoStriker.label: forge striker picto
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoStriker.descripti: Forge a Striker Picto from Chroma and pure metals. This Picto enhances offensive capabilities and can unlock the "Chromatic Blade" Lumina.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoHealer.label: forge healer picto
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoHealer.descriptio: Forge a Healer Picto from Chroma and precious stones. This Picto accelerates healing and can unlock the "Vital Restoration" Lumina.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoScholar.label: forge scholar picto
LanguageData.Expedition33_CraftPictoScholar.descripti: Forge a Scholar Picto from Chroma and noble materials. This Picto enhances intellect and can unlock the "Chromatic Insight" Lumina.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ProcessChromaRaw.label: refine raw chroma
LanguageData.Expedition33_ProcessChromaRaw.descriptio: Process collected raw Chroma to obtain pure Chroma usable in Picto crafting.
